translated: Verses of the Elder Nuns🔽The Group of Dukanipāta
“As far as the land of Kāsi,
Having made the village my price,
they set my price at half.
Then I became disenchanted with form,

analyzed: nibbindan ca virajjaha  mā puna jātisasāra
translated: and through disenchantment I became dispassionate.🔽So that I might not wander in birth and becoming
I have realized the three knowledges,
